email_body:
Dear Sir/Madam, 
  
Compliments of the day to you. Japan National Arts & Crafts Import/Export Corporation is a group of business men who deal on Art and Crafts. As the year begins we want to start  exporting our products  into the Canada/America/UK . We are searching for representatives who can help us establish a medium of getting to our customers in the  Canada/America /UK as well as making payments through you to us. Please if you are interested in transacting business with us we will be very glad. A remuneration is worked out for your services as a representative of our firm in your region. Our company is going to be paying you  10% on every transaction.
   
  Please you need to be informed that you are not going to use your money in this transaction  .
   
  Subject to your satisfaction we will proceed with further Official protocol. Please if you are interested forward name,residential/postal address and phone/fax numbers. 
  Below is respective consultant of the company you can contact for further details:
   
  Mr.Williams  Hill
  (mr_williamshillo1@yahoo.com)
 
Thank You
[Managing Director]
  Biglobe Inc.

             


		
---------------------------------
